name: Del Mar Networks
desc: Web traffic data collected from tracking server load, i.e. understanding which servers are used for which subdomains in order to track relative traffic over time.
top_tickers: AMZN, BABA, CARS, EBAY, RKUNY, T, W, WBA, WMT, ZG
full_sector_coverage: E-commerce retailers, social media and video sharing sites, and public-facing data platforms such as Zillow.
data_delivery: Raw, Platform Based, Custom Analysis, Clean Datasets (.csv), S3 access, SFTP, email
why_us?: Minute-level customer trend data from continuous profiling of web infrastructure
advantages: Unlike clickstream or aggregated customer data, data collected from profiling web infrastructure is free of sampling bias, pressures of public opinion (tracking), and completely independent of any PPI concerns. Data is distributed with very low latency, and is easy to integrate.
use_cases: Earning beats and misses, distressed debt strategies, long-only strategies
